name: Color Pop
description:
Color pop is addictive, easy to play, swipe and pop the balls!

If you like bubbles shooting type of games or you prefer games that require reflex, speed and concentration, you’ll love Color Pop!

Can you destroy all the balls and complete all 100 levels.

Some special balls like a timer will stop all balls for 10 seconds giving you time to destroy a lot of balls.

Bombs can be used to destroy many balls simultaneously.

Bomb, timer and multicolour balls appear randomly. You must collect them or buy them in the shop section of the game.

Please, check out all my others games and apps.

Thank you!
